Text: Please seed 1:1 or higher if possible, my connection is rather slow.
Thanks!! Do you have any cover for this movie?
THIS ISN'T WORKING, IT'S CORRUPTED, VIDEO SCATTERED ALL OVER! PLEASE RE-SEED!

There's nothing wrong with the file, use a real video player like VLC
http://www.videolan.org/

Thanks to nocarrier2 for this up.

Due to the use of Nero Recode when transcoding from the original NTSC DVD to a MP4 file, it's quite difficult to transcode this MP4 to anything else.

So that I can play this documentary on my set top DVD player with my TV, I created a successful XviD avi of this MP4 by converting it with "AllToAVI".

To rriemann,
Check out the Robert Frank documentary "Fire in the East: A Portrait of Robert Frank" here:

Thanks for the info.  I have stopped using Nero Recode and started using StaxRip which creates much more compatible movies.
